title: Goblin Vocalizations
description: Goblin Vocalizations sound package with 180 high-quality small-monster sound effects, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/mse-goblin-vocalizations-preview

Full Audio Preview: https://youtu.be/N7NI7T1uNB8

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/el4egkkte0v6x1m/MSE%20-%20Goblin%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


The goblin is a creature of small size, fast, nimble, with little strength, so it sometimes bites. Taking advantage of their speed and shrewdness, goblins often become thieves and spies. All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design. 


The collection contains 18 voice actions, including 180 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 16 voice sounds during an attack
  • 8 battle shouts
  • 4 biting voice sounds
  • 16 deaths
  • 16 growls
  • 16 pains
  • 20 roars
  • 8 snarls
  • 8 victory shouts
  • 4 coughing sounds
  • 8 effort sounds
  • 8 groans
  • 8 idle voice sounds
  • 12 sounds when jumping
  • 4 laughing sounds
  • 4 sounds of upset
  • 12 grunting sounds
  • 8 sounds of tiredness


Among the attacking type of vocalizations there are both short and long ones, the pain type vocalizations also have different lengths. The voice samples are quite dry and ready for further processing. Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is perfect for creating the voices of small-monsters: goblin, hobbit, orc, gnome, troglodyte, little alien and other small creatures.


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 180 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 18 voice actions
  • 80 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 40 voice samples of the pain type
  • 60 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 180

Number of Audio Cues: 180

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 3 minutes 23 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
